title: US House impeachment of Biden border chief in jeopardy, voting continues
paragraph:
Â© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas takes his seat to testify before a Senate Appropriations Homeland Security Subcommittee hearing on the department's budget request on Capitol Hill in Washington, U.S., May 26, 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Three U.S. House of Representatives Republicans on Tuesday voted against the impeachment of Alejandro Mayorkas, the secretary of the homeland security department, enough to put the measure in jeopardy.
